**Research in our lab focuses on: (1) the ecology and conservation of tropical biodiversity, (2) plant population dynamics and plant-animal interactions in fragmented tropical landscapes, and (3) the structure of scientific institutions and networks, and how  these structures influence global patterns of scientific productivity.**
